Package au.csiro.pathling.fhirpath

Interface Materializable

All Known Implementing Classes:
BooleanCollection, DateCollection, DateTimeCollection, DecimalCollection, EmptyCollection, IntegerCollection, StringCollection, TimeCollection
public interface Materializable
An interface for collections that can be converted to an external value suitable for Spark SQL operations.

This interface is intended for collections that can be represented as a column in a Spark DataFrame. Implementations should provide a way to convert the collection into a Spark SQL column.

See Also:

  • Method Details

    • toExternalValue

      @Nonnull default Column toExternalValue()
      Converts this collection to an external value that can be used in Spark SQL operations.

      The default implementation returns the raw column value, but implementations can override this to provide custom conversion logic.

      Returns:
      A Spark SQL column representing the external value of this collection

    • getColumn

      @Nonnull ColumnRepresentation getColumn()
      Gets the column representation of this collection.
      Returns:
      The column representation of this collection

    • getExternalValue

      @Nonnull static Column getExternalValue(@Nonnull Collection collection)
      Gets the external value of a collection.

      If the collection implements Materializable, its toExternalValue() method is called. Otherwise, an exception is thrown.

      Parameters:
      collection - The collection to get the external value from
      Returns:
      A Spark SQL column representing the external value of the collection
      Throws:
      UnsupportedOperationException - If the collection does not implement Materializable
